name: Jamrunner (Alpha)
description:
My entry to My First Game Jam!

This is Jamrunner, a simple little runner game.  Little blue guy runs automatically.  Jump over logs and rocks to avoid getting splatted, and don't fall down!

Sets of platforms will randomly spawn ahead of you, with some coins to collect along the way.

If you collect 50 coins you win!

Controls:

Left Click / Space / Z = Jump

Right Click / Escape = Pause

I made all of these assets from scratch during the course of the game, including all art / audio assets.  I hope you enjoy my silly little game, it is the first one I've ever fully completed on my own :)  Nothing special but it's something!

***Uploaded as HTML5 currently, but the quit button I originally implemented with a standalone version in mind so it will simply stop the game.  I will try to polish this up some more and add some stuff down the line :)
